name: Yandex Metrika
description: Add Yandex Metrika to any theme.

counter_id.label: Counter ID
counter_id.info: You can find your counter id info in settigs

validation.error_message: Not a valid counter ID. It should be from 7 to 9 numbers

async_code.label: Asynchronous code
async_code.info: Asynchronous code does not block or affect the download speed of your site's page.

no_index.label: Do not index site
no_index.info: The prohibition of the automatic sending of the pages of the site on which Metrica's counter is installed, for indexing Yandex.

alternate_cdn.label: Alternate CDN
alternate_cdn.info: Allows you to correctly take into account visits from regions where access to Yandex resources is limited. Using this option can reduce the speed of loading the counter code.
